com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx

Class TestPasswordFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.TestPasswordFinder

  • public class TestPasswordFinder
extends Object
    Unit tests to verify the behaviour of the @{link CRXPasswordFinder} class.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestPasswordFinder() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUp()
      Prepare for test case execution by initialising the mock objects and test fixtures.
      void testWithoutSecurityDispatcher()
      Verify that the password returns the plain text password when there is no security dispatcher.
      void testWithSecurityDispatcher()
      Verify that the password returns the plain text password when there is a security dispatcher to decrypt the password.
      void testWithSecurityDispatcherThrowingException()
      Verify that the password returns the plain text password when the security dispatcher fails to decrypt the password.

        public void testWithoutSecurityDispatcher()
                                   throws Exception

      • testWithSecurityDispatcher

        public void testWithSecurityDispatcher()
                                throws Exception
        Verify that the password returns the plain text password when there is a security dispatcher to decrypt the password.

        Exception - If there was an unexpected error during test case execution.

      • testWithSecurityDispatcherThrowingException

        public void testWithSecurityDispatcherThrowingException()
                                                 throws Exception
        Verify that the password returns the plain text password when the security dispatcher fails to decrypt the password.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an unexpected error during test case execution.
